===================== CAMERA Find Isotopes =====================
----------- Description -----------
| Annotate isotope peaks for a xsAnnotate object. Returns a xsAnnotate object with annotated isotopes.
----------- Input files -----------
+------------------------------+------------+ | File | Format | +==============================+============+ | 1) xsAnnotate file | rdata | +------------------------------+------------+
---------- Parameters ----------
xsAnnotate file | A rdata file with a xsAnnotate object from one sample |
maxcharge | Max. number of the isotope charge |
------------ Output files ------------
camera_find_isotopes_output_1.rdata | A rdata file containing one xsAnnotate object with annotated isotopes |
